events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting strong skills in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application was reviewed by the recruitment team and categorised under Engineering based on the candidate's experience and job requirements.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process and coordinate next steps.
The initial phone screening was conducted successfully; the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in software architecture and development methodologies.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm to continue with the technical interview stage and availability for scheduling.
The technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-07 at 10:00 AM UTC, focusing on system design and coding challenges.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing excellent problem-solving skills and proficiency in relevant programming languages.
The HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 15:00 UTC to discuss cultural fit and employment terms.
The HR interview concluded positively, with the candidate expressing alignment with company values and clear interest in the position.
A job offer has been proposed to the candidate, including competitive salary and benefits tailored to their experience and expectations.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer, requesting minor clarifications on remote work policies and vacation time.
The candidate accepted the offer formally and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team and contribute to upcoming projects.
The onboarding process has commenced with the candidate completing all required documentation and beginning orientation sessions.
The hiring process is officially closed. The candidate has successfully onboarded and started working as a part of the engineering team.
